'''22w44a''' is the third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.19.3]], released on November 2, 2022,<ref>{{snap|22w44a|November 2, 2022}}</ref> which adds new spawn eggs, tweaks the Creative inventory,  and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* [[File:Ender Dragon Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Ender dragon spawn egg]]
* [[File:Iron Golem Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Iron golem spawn egg]]
* [[File:Snow Golem Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snow golem spawn egg]]
* [[File:Wither Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wither spawn egg]]
** Ender dragon and wither spawn eggs are only available through commands to prevent accidental destruction of player builds.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Game rule]]s'''
* Added <code>blockExplosionDropDecay</code>, <code>mobExplosionDropDecay</code> and <code>tntExplosionDropDecay</code>.
** When set to <code>false</code>, all blocks drop loot.
** When set to <code>true</code>, blocks drop loot randomly depending on how far from the explosion center.
** Defaults to <code>false</code> for TNT, <code>true</code> for block and mob.
* Added <code>snowAccumulationHeight</code>.
** When it is snowing, this game rule determines the maximum number of snow layers that can be accumulated in each block.
** Defaults to <code>1</code>.
** Set to <code>0</code> makes no snow form at all.
** Set to <code>8</code> or above lets snow form up to the level of a full block.
* Added <code>waterSourceConversion</code> and <code>lavaSourceConversion</code>.
** When set to <code>true</code>, allows new sources of that fluid to form.
** Defaults to <code>true</code> for water and <code>false</code> for lava.
* Added <code>globalSoundEvents</code>, controlling whether certain gameplay moments are heard by all players regardless of location, defaults to <code>true</code>.

=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added the following item tag:
** <code>#fence_gates</code>: {{cd|d=and|acacia_fence_gate|birch_fence_gate|dark_oak_fence_gate|jungle_fence_gate|oak_fence_gate|spruce_fence_gate|crimson_fence_gate|warped_fence_gate|mangrove_fence_gate}}.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Monster Spawner|Spawner]]s'''
* Renamed to "Monster Spawner" to match {{BE}}, and removed purple text color.
* No longer have a default mob spawn type when placed by a player, which was a pig previously.
* Don't emit fire particles when a mob spawn type has not been defined.
* Pick-block now works for spawner blocks.
* The mob type is now displayed in the hover description of a spawner item stack.
** If a mob type has not been defined yet, the hover description will describe how to set it.

=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* Changed the colors of [[polar bear]] spawn egg (to [[File:Polar Bear Spawn Egg JE2 BE2.png|32px]]), to distinguish it from the ghast spawn egg.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Turtle]]s'''
* Now have a 5 minute cooldown after [[breeding]].

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Minecart with spawner]]s'''
* Don't emit fire particles when a mob spawn type has not been defined.
* Renamed to "Minecart with Monster Spawner".

=== Gameplay ===
'''Creative inventory'''
* Operator-only blocks and items can now be found in the "Redstone Blocks" tab when have the required permissions. This includes the [[barrier]], all variants of [[command block]]s, [[debug stick]], [[jigsaw block]], [[light block]] (level 15), [[minecart with command block]] and [[structure void]], but does not include the [[structure block]].
* In "Functional Blocks" tab:
** Added bee nest and tinted glass.
** Moved respawn anchor before beds.
** Reordered pressure plates by functionality.
** Moved end portal frame and infested blocks here from Natural Blocks tab.
* In "Redstone Blocks" tab:
** Added barrel, cauldron, chest, composter and furnace.
* In "Building Blocks" tab:
** Added block of amethyst and chain.
** Moved block of redstone and block of coal here from the Natural Blocks tab.
* In "Crafting" tab:
** Added ancient debris.
* Reordered the following tabs for better consistency:
** Building blocks
** Consumables
** Natural blocks

=== General ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Step sounds can now be heard when walking on [[carpet]]s, [[lily pad]]s and [[small amethyst bud]]s.
* Step sounds can now be heard when walking through [[crimson roots]], [[glow lichen]], [[Nether sprouts]] and [[warped roots]].

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Removed <code>#non_flammable_wood</code> block tag.
* Added crimson roots, glow lichen, lily pad, moss carpet, Nether sprouts, small amethyst bud, warped roots and <code>#wool_carpets</code> to the <code>#inside_step_sound_blocks</code> block tag.
* Removed crimson hanging sign and warped hanging sign from the <code>#non_flammable_wood</code> item tag.

== Experimental ==
These additions and changes only take effect when the 1.20 experimental data pack is enabled.

=== Additions ===
==== General ====
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added bamboo fence gate to the new <code>#fence_gates</code> item tag, as the additional part when built-in datapack enabled.

=== Changes ===
==== Blocks ====
'''[[Bamboo fence]], [[bamboo fence gate]] and [[bamboo mosaic]]s'''
* Can be used as fuel now.

'''[[Chiseled bookshelves]]'''
* Now work with [[hopper]]s and [[dropper]]s.

==== General ====
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added bamboo mosaic slab and bamboo mosaic stairs to the <code>#mineable/axe</code> block tag.
* Added crimson hanging sign and warped hanging sign to the <code>#non_flammable_wood</code> item tag.
* Removed bamboo mosaic slab from the <code>#wooden_slabs</code> block and item tag.
* Removed bamboo mosaic stairs from the <code>#wooden_stairs</code> block and item tag.
